values:
"Honest to God I will break your heart., tear you to pieces and rip you apart...."--30 Seconds to Mars

"I can feel you all around me, thickening the air I'm breathing. Hold on to what I'm feeling, savoring this heart that's healing."--Flyleaf


Idk LJ. Maybe it's me. Do I just attract those same kind of people? I mean really? I kind of miss high school at times like this cause at least then you knew the fakeness upfront. I think sometimes I will take the weird attractions and living on the outskirts compared to this thing. Idk what I'm even in right now. It's like adulthood with childish antics. I think sometimes its a life lesson that i'm not quite picking up on. But then if im not learning anything then wats the point? It's all waste then right? That's how I think at least. But I guess that doesn't stop the lesson. I think that just stops the person from trying anymore.

A dark space,
filled with yield signs and stop lights,
many roads left unpaved,.

Vacant buildings,
a parking garage with one space open,
this one spot has been saved.

In and out,
one car after another,
nothing truly permanent.

A BMW with tinted windows,
triple black with leather interior,
with barely any millage spent.

A bright red honda,
fuzzy dice in the mirror,
and a bumper sticker on the back.

The neon dodge of bight yellow,
was parked for quite a while,
but still left to get back on track.

But here comes a new car,
something mysterious and sleek,
I think I've seen this one before.

It drives like a dream,
but like the rest of them,
I'll be left with just my garage door.

So it's been like forever and two days since i've written on this thing but I felt like I really needed a place to just write freely about all the things I'm thinking about right now. I'm so angry at her. I mean not only did she go see her on my birthday but now on our one year she can go give her dog shots but can't stop by to say hi. I am so disappointed right now that I'm near tears. Like I was thinking that she would do something thoughtful and come to my work just to see me and say happy anniversary cause thats something I would have done for her. Or even come by at midnight just to say she say me even for a second. But no she can make time to give her "friend's" dogs shots. I don't know what to think or what to feel right now. I kinda want to explode but dont want to get it all over my laptop. I guess thats what I get for having high expectations right.

"Could not even tell me truthfully and you wanna know how that makes me feel....I can't feel anything"

 

I'm beginning to notice
how much this feels
like a waking limb
pens and needles
nice to know you
goodbye

Shmone got a livejournal so i'm suppose to send you guys to her cause she can't find you all.....she is under my friends as majesticmoney....add her and I can help her do the rest. 

xoxo Britterz

Just when my mind is made up and my heart is ready to deal with the pain that follows she puts a monkey wrench in my plans and shows me I'm wrong.
How does she do that?
How can she change my way of thinking from cloudy to clear through meer words?
Does she know she does that?
How does it work?

Her hand feels like my safety in this storm. Grabbing on just for a quick moment puts me back on my feet enough to leave the storm. 
I couldn't stand before and now I can walk.
Maybe just maybe I'll be able to run.
Oh that will be the day.

I was sick a few nights ago.
Really sick. 
Like passing out at work causing disruption to passing by guests so that a manager was called to come get me.
Yeah I do this thing where I forget all meds and food for a day or so.
It's not that bad. 
If they weren't so necessary.
She took care of me. 
Like a motherly yet more than friendship type of way that makes you feel loved.
The lady at the dinner thought it was cute.
So did I.

She might be good for me.
Despite what everyone else in my life has said.
Yeah I know her past.
But we are dealing with it because I've done some things a lot of ppl dont know about.
Mine is not quite different from hers just on a different level thats all.
She makes me smile.
She melts my heart.
That's all that matters.

So a lot has happened since I've last update on this thing. I really dont come here as much as I use to so I figured I should make an update of the news. Umm well where should I start...

So I'm no longer single. That's a happy point in my life. Some of you know who it is and some of you don't. But I promise this person is amazing. I have wanted to be with them for over 3 years now and it has finally happened and I couldn't be happier than I am now. It's funny because James and I were talking and he mentioned how originally I said I wouldn't be dating anyone my senior year and how that changed. But it's ok because my baby is worth it. 

I'm a Celebritee(sp?) at work. In understandable terms, my boss, managers, and coorporate are taking me out to dinner to reward me for doing such a great job during the holidays. I'm so excited because I've never met coorporate so this shall be interesting. I can't wait to meet Steve. I heard he is pretty amazing so this should be fun.

I'm done with finals thank goodness because those were stressin me out big time. I put my baby through so much this week but then my boo got sick so I had to be nurse and not worry so much and I think that really helped in the long run.

Life is just finally starting to settle down and fix itself. I'm happy. I'm in anger management and as much as I think it isn't working it really is. I joke about it and all that but it really does work and is making me a slightly calmer person. My relationship is great cause I have someone that really cares for me and shows me that everyday. Bought me a rose after my first final. It was so sweet so I bought them a singing frog to make my baby feel better. Things are just getting together for me and I think finally things might all fall into place.

So you know when you have just finished this really indepth conversation were in some intense and strange sense things maybe came together and yet you are still somwhat still a blur that you aren't sure if your words still make sense?

Yeah thats me.

I'm so sick and tired of labels. Yeah that's right labels. Why must we label the society we live in by different classes or different social standings. I hate labels. If you dress in mostly black why must you be punk or a goth? Since when did you have to fit that category just because you like the color black? So what if you like the color pink and wear it a lot...is it still wrong to listen to death metal and rock out to pearl jam? SO what if you like chicks and dudes? What is wrong with just being able to share the love with everyone? Why is our society so hellbend on making sure everyone is labeled? You're a goth, you're a queer, you're a freak, what the hell? I hate that conformist made this acceptable and now everyone feels that though they know it's wrong it is ok to do. I hate how I have found myself in the situation of actually being part of this retard fad of labels because the people around me where doing it too. I refuse to be another socially retarded American that can't think for themselves and is scared to step outside the norm just because a label might be attached to my ass as soon as I do. I'm sorry that I like to wear pink every now and then, and nirvana still makes me smile. That when I'm sad I put on indie music and wear blue. So what if I feel some old school rap music is ok and that everyone once in a while a dumb upbeat song from some rap artist whose name starts with "lil" is decent enough to me to pay attention too. Stop fucking labeling people. it's not the cool thing to do. In fact it's so fucking retarded that in order for it to be socially acceptable everyone has to agree to it. If at least a hand ful of people will step up enough to acknowledge when they mistakenly do a random act of labeling and know that it isn't right...maybe this world would be decent enough to live in.

So here it goes. I'm Brittany. I'm black. I like all music. My wardrobe is a minor reflection of who I am on a day to day basis. I like boys. I like girls. I don't like to be labeled as gay, lesbian, bi, confused or any other shit people want to sugar coat my life. I am who I am. I'll be who I want to be. And there is no label in this world that shall ever be able to some up me. So put that in your pipe and smoke it.

so yeah my new years was pretty fun. Went to Amandas. And if anyone has ever been to one of her parties you know exactly how it was. Lots of grinding, sweating, yelling and much much more. Originally wasn't having that great of a time but Shmone got me into the spirit and I ended up not wanting to leave. I had so much fun even if my ex was there being the biggest ass there is. But....It was still great. I feel so much closer to Money now. And...I got my new year's kiss. lol yay....actually I got 2....one of each you could say.

Can't wait to really get into this year because there is so much to look forward to. Graduating, Valentine's day, Prom, Moving out....the list is endless. 

Adrian and I aren't currently talking so there goes my boy. But oh well we will see what happens. I have a cute girl in mind right now.

I'm trying to break the cycle guys so just bare with me. No more repeats of the past 2 years. Some of you know what that means. You might have to help me.

And I think I am finally ready for my first tatoo. It will be chinese characters for inner beauty. Once the snow lets up and I get more spendin cash....it's going down. Also another piercing is in the works. I just feel like this year is all about what I want. And those two things are on the list so there we have it.

"If you let go, I'll let go tonight."

So I am pretty excited about how things are going so far. Haven't really had much time to spend with people lately but that's not completely my fault. I have been working my ass off like crazy because we are all working everday at Celebration and so you do what you have to do. My check however will be huge and for that I'm excited. So thanks to this large check I am starting my trip fund. Late I know but I had emergencies come up and medical stuff came up so that funding had to go to other things but now i'm on track and things have calme down a bit so I think I will be ok. 

Love life=complicated. I really adore this boy. Everyday I feel myself getting closer to him and yet I still have to be so far away. If only there was just moment in time where everything didn't matter and it could just happen as it may. *sigh*

Anger Management starts soon. I am truly happy about this. It will be something new for me and who knows how the outcome might turn out. It could truly change my life and that could be something new I'm ready for. Just imagine...me...super nice. All calm and collected. Wow.

So I think I'm going to take up kickboxing again. I read that in this new class I need to channel my anger somewhere so I figured why not. I don't know if I will have time for it but I will have to make time somehow or something like it. If I find a great class and if anyone wants to sign up with me then let me know and I will get back to you.

Even though we havent been on break that long I feel like it has been a lifetime. Away from the stress of school and the drama of people just to finally connect with the things I need to connect with. Some inner peace even. It's really good for me. I get to do my yoga now and it has been a really big thing. Believe it or not bending yourself into numerous positions that might appear uncomfortable and may cause slight discomfort is really rewarding. 

All in all things have been going well and I'm hoping this is the new path that I take with me into the new year. Things should only be looking up from here. Besides I'm almost out of high school and that in itself brings a smile to my face and a song in my head. 

OH!! I almost forgot I'm putting together a senior video. Not the one that will be shown at graduation but a personal one of just the people that have impacted me and I plan to have a viewing of it the last week of school. So I will be stalking everyone with a camera. Just act natural.

"I've got to move on and be who I am. I just don't belong here I hope you understand."

 I thought of someone when I was listening to that. I think they know who they are.

So I have been talking to this guy. Carrie's boyfriend's cousin to be exact even though I knew him and was interested in him before Carrie and Tiny started dating. But anyways we have been spending time together and getting tighter and I think with a little time and some more trust in us things might be ok. Its about time I had a man. He is 20 and just adorable. 

"You're rushing through me, I feel you moving through me. And now I feel so alive, so alive. Finally I feel complete, cause you have rushed over me. "

To a certain person out there whom I truly care about....Don't continue to break your heart for a broken wing's prayer. Be happy and you know what your heart needs. Give it time to be all that you need it to be but don't spend your whole life waiting. This is suppose to be the time of your life right now and if it isn't there is a problem I love you too much for you to be this upset and no matter what fights we have and how bad they get you know just like I did this time that I will have your back. Keep your chin up and your spirits high.

It might have been a day late but I finally had my thanksgiving. It was great.

OH and that really sexy mexican of mine...just might be more than a friend soon enough. I might have to strangle a hooters girl in the process but sometimes you have to fight for what you want. Not saying he is officially what I want but he could make it on my to do list.

I am really starting to like him. Damn age difference. I hate that he is this young and I am so old. Does age really make a difference if it's by oh....less than 2 years? I mean really is less than 2 years a big age difference?

Just felt like posting so here goes.

Found a guy at work that wants just to have fun w/o the emotions. Very excited.
Went to see Good Luck Chuck tonight with Karleena and I must say I want a guy to jump out a box in a penguiin outfit for me.
Skip was back at Steak and Shake.
I wanna get closer to you.
Girls just wanna have fun.
I'm on the outside looking in. 
I am gonna hurt someone before annie is over.
I took a dare so I didn't have to tell the truth. True story.


"Stepping out tonight, flying so high, it's the good times, keeping me alive. "

"And I hate how much I love you boy, I can't stand how much I need you. And I hate how much I love you boy, but I just can't let you go. And I hate that I love you so."

So I'm absolutely in love with that song right now. I hate how much one song can just overtake me to a point where I'm relating every aspect of my life to it and finding too many similarities for me own liking. Take that as you wish. We all know that we have a similar situation in our lives to that song or have at one point.

I don't want to start having feelings anymore for him. That is not what my senior year is suppose to be about. It is about random boys that aren't emotionally attached to me to just have fun and nothing more. I don't want a serious thing this year because I know I will just have to leave him at the end of the year and I don't want to go through that heartache. The only problem is that I truly can't let him go and I hate that I love him so because the people that truly know me actually know that I never got over this kid. Let's face it I am just usually good adt pushing my emotions to the side so that I make myself believe I am over him. It works for a decent amount of time too and then I just can't hide it anymore and I'm all like " damn I like him again."

I am getting so stressed these days. This play is going to be my undoing.

"Now it's too late to apologize, it's too late. Said it's too late to apologize, it's too late."

Someone needs to get that picture because they aren't seeing it.

Ok random moments that make me smile....

"No one answer your phone!"
"Well me and Margo can have sex. That's ok right?"
"I was so high I fucked the rail." "Wow!"
"Lets have a cops theme!" "Wait I thought you wanted people to show UP to the prom."
"Ok so Mr. McGaw what's 65+25? Thats 100 right?"
"Where did Joe go?" "Where were you?! He left an hour ago."
"Mrs. Antieu do you have any good murder stories?" "No....WAIT...yes"
"Homework anyone?" SIGHS

"I wanna get closer to you, closer to you."

So yeah there is this guy. I like this guy. But there is this other guy. I am starting to like him too. The first guy likes me back. The second guy I'm not sure. It would seem easy to see who to pick however guy number one doesn't really fit into my world we kind of have a seperate world and guy number two fits into every aspect of my world but almost too much. See the problem?

But this year I want to keep to my pact. I don't want to enter into anything serious this year. I don't want a relationship but if I happen to fall for one of those guys hard enough then I might make an exception however nothing serious. I made this pact with Bry years ago and I tend to stick to it. It is senior year and I don't want to get hurt when school ends and we go our seperate ways.

"You don't think you're caught, think you're special, think you're smart and you're pulling me apart."

That's how I feel about that friendship and I'm glad I gave up on it. That person was just bad news and self-destructive and right now is the time for growth meaning you have to let go of those you don't need. I don't need someone in my life that is unstable to herself and everyone around her. I don't have time to fix you went I'm preparing myself for the end. I don't mind helping people that need it but I"m sorry to say this I can't work miracles and that is what she needs so that friendship had to be terminated. Honestly, I have been much better off like I knew I would. 

"Could not even tell me truthfully, and you wanna know how it makes me feel? I can't feel anything."

Hung out with BFFK last night in EL. It was a lot of fun since we haven't hung out in a long time. Had amazing chinese food. Listened to Young Love. Just like old times.

Took Senior Pics today!!! I felt like a model it was great. 

Picked out my class ring today as well. Can't wait for it to arrive it is so pretty.

"I hope I see around, the way I always do. It's always a surprise, to be with you."

That is directed to someone in specific but no one will ever guess who including that person and that's the way I want it.

I hate when my emotions get crazy. Damn you Depo. I will be better in a week or so. Good times to come.

"I ask myself is there something left, I hold my breath and I wonder. I give up on you, I want to give up but you make it so hard, you make things so hard."

So yeah....finally results....sinus infection, eye infection throat infection and ear infection. Yeah thats right...fucking I.D.D didn't stop not one of these from developing so yeah totally not coming to school tomorrow for the most part. I might go for stats but thats about it. Still deciding on if I am going for dance rehersals....we will see how these meds do.

Dumb people annoy me.

Ally fucking rocks me socks. So does Tajalli and Emily and Cedric. Pretty much that whole Stats corner is amazing. We have "WTF" moments when listening to our classmates talk and then slip into our own little world.

Hey you, yeah you, stop being a dumbass and actually follow through with your responsibilites. Also, unlike you I will talk about you to your face. Just ask. 

New crush and unlike some DUMB ppl looks don't have a huge part in this one. He is nice, smart, funny and a weirdo that won't feed me chicken noodle soup but will bring me slurpees. IT ISN"T DEVIN!!!

"I  give up on you, I want to give up...you make it so hard, you make it so hard."

"What would you do, if you knew what I'd do, what were you expecting, did you think I would get mad, fall down, break down. Never thought it would come to this, but you got so reckless, no blind just wish I could not see."

Young Love is now starting to re-enter my life but at a good time.

New policy this year: If you wish to talk to me about problems or issues do it directly. I prefer one on one talks.I am truly trying to be different this year and not be negative and accept everyone. Forgiveness is a huge part of this new me.

He talks to me in a way that makes me blush. I'm black for those of you that don't know and it is to a point where others can see me blushing. Through my black skin they see a deep red. He is just so different from people around me. We have random conversations that don't relate one topic to the previous or next and yet it just all seems to make sense to us in our little world. I think all great things in life start out this way. I don't want to rush into anything because I am in a fragile state where I"m starting to become the girl I want to be and I think a new boy would make things complicated but right where we are know is a good start.

Check out TELL ME by YOUNG LOVE. It is on purevolume.com and it is an amazing song.

Life once again is great. It really is. I don't see how I didn't have this much fun with my life. I am having the time of my life these days and it feels great.

So lets give a quick recap:
1. Elizabeth is fucking awesome now that we are friends.
2. Ally knows all and is always right.
3. I don't have any problems with anyone and its good.
4. Carrie and I are back on the same page.
5. Devin has made it into my top 5.
6. Hanging out with Lantz and Devin is just hularious.
7. My mood has been like a thousand times better.
8. I have been nice this week and I think I'm getting the hang of it.
9. I like school
10. I have extremely high hopes that Annie will just be fucking amazing.


I LOVE THIS NEW ME. SHE IS SO HAPPY AND FREE WHICH IS SO NEW TO HER. SHE SMILES MORE AND AT THE END OF THE DAY HAS AT LEAST ONE THING TO BE HAPPY ABOUT. I REALLY HOPE THIS TURNS OUT TO BE A NEW, PERMANENT THING.

"For a moment, I thought I lost everything, for a moment, I forgot about our memories. But then I woke up and I realized how much you mean to me, for a moment, I thought I lost you and me."
SO TOMORROW IS MY 2ND BIRTHDAY AKA ADOPTION ANNIVERSARY.!!!!!!!! I'M SO EXCITED!!!! I CAN'T WAIT. IT IS GOING TO BE GREAT IT ALWAYS IS. YAY ME!!!!

<font size="2">So I have a friend coming to visit in a week and she will be here for a couple of days and I have no idea where to take her to have fun. I don't want to do those boring site seeing trips because let's be real this is lansing but still where can I take her thats not more that a half hour away from here? Any ideas? I'll take any that you have. HELP PLZ!!!!</font>

Movin in with Bry for part of the summer. Definitely need it and really soon. I was going to do it a lot earlier but with my dad's relapse yet again and his HUGE surgery on Monday I have to stay another week. I wouldn't mind but this surgery is deeper than the 20 other ones. This one could seriously kill him if it doesn't go well so I will be in Ann Arbor with him this time. But after that it will be time to blow this popsicle stand and spend it with my BFF. Omg  we are going to have way too much. It will be like 8th grade summer all over again. Minus Antonio. Haha

Realized today how much I love my car. I had to buy a new tire and have it looked at and it was the scariest thing ever. Made me want to cry thats how much I need my car. But my baby is ok now and that's the most important part of the whole thing.

So I spent so much time chasing after Micheal Jackson when there was a normal boy right there the entire time. He is so sweet and nice. He listened and checked up on me after finding out about my fight with my mother. He was concerned and wanted to make sure I was doing ok. We have a date on Wednesday but my mom is being evil so I dont know if she will let me go out with him. I sure hope so because I really want to. I dont know where this will go but it couldnt hurt to try and find out. Besides it would be nice to be around a man and not little Annie.

I love my outsiders!!! We rock!!! We are amazing. Cant wait to take more outsider trips with my outcast friends and go to dinner with them then a movie then have crazy time driving home. lol Ready for Lake Odessa and Novi with my best friend ever. Me and Bry are unstoppable. More to come later.

I've done evrything as you say, I followed your rules without question, I thought it would help me see things clearly, but instead of helping me to see, i look around and it's like I'm blinded. I'm spinning out of control...out of control. I'm spinning out of control...out of control.

Where should I go? What should I do? I dont understand what you want from me. 'cause I dont know if I should trust you or all of the things you've said to me. and I may never know the answer to this endless mystery. Where should I go? What should I do? I dont understand what you want from me.

I feel like I'm spinning out of control, try to focus but everything's twisted. and all along I thought you would be here to let me know I'm not alone but in fact that's exactly what I was. I'm spinning out of control...out of control. I'm spinning out of control...out of control.

All alone and spinning out of control. Out of control... 


They say everything for me....

Doing pretty damn good right now so yeah. Lovely fucking life, lovely fucking friends, everything is just so fucking lovely. 

"Why'd you cry, for the guy, say goodbye. Why'd you cry, for the guy, say goodbye, i say ok cause. Oh don't you miss me like a whole in the head cause I do boy and it's true boy. Oh bet you never thought I would get out of bed, cause of you boy, such a fool."

"I'm through with it, not having it, this crazy shit. Not feeling this, until I quit, no more, no more."

I'm glad this school year is almost over. Time to be out of school and just on my own for a while. About damn time.

Careless and free,
thats what you'll be,
as gentle as the rain.

Patient and kind,
very hard to find,
with kisses that ease the pain.

A favoring smile,
you'll stay for a while,
to listen as if you care.

You'll take my hand,
and you'll undertand,
as fingers run through my hair.

With words so sweet,
our hearts will beat,
together as if we were one.

We'll laugh and play,
and swing all day,
issues there will be none.

The plays we'll see,
and places we'll be,
will only pass the days.

Those things won't matter,
my heart you won't shatter,
a love and bond shall stay.

Our eyes will gleam, 
forever in my dreams,
we'll always be together.

But until I find you,
here's what I'll do,
watch the rain...the perfect weather.

Spring break has had so many ups and downs and dips and twists and turns it is crazy. I've found this song last night that I had been searching for but I found it as I was crying and it's an emo song so great timing. Last night was truly crazy. I had a great time with Jill, Carrie, and Jimmy because we can just sit in Steak N'  Shake and be retarded and have everyone ine the place judge us like we are dumb and still have the best time ever. That's why I love those guys. I dont know what I would do if I didnt have them in my life. But then my night ended with me crying. I don' t want to get into detail about it but mucho thanks to the ppl that tried to make me feel better and were there for me. Especially Carrie like I would have just lost it if it wasn't for her. She kept me level headed as much as she could and kept my feet on the ground when I just wanted to jump off a bridge so mucho thanks to her. 

I'm talking to my old best friend again and it's so great to be able to talk to her again because despite all the drama we have been through I've missed her so much. I'm going to her house after kareoke tonight so yay!!!

Had lunch today with my mom and Jimmy and of course she did the mom thing by asking him every question she could think of then sharing my 2 big bad stories about the only 2 times I've actually gotten in trouble. They were embarrasing a little but then again it was good to see her take to him well. She's a really nice lady if you are nice to her first. He was really quiet though so she had something to say about that and she thinks he should talk more. But besides that all went well so I'm happy about that. Now we just have to go through the dinner with him and my dad. That will be a hell of a lot harder than lunch with mom. I hope we can all survive that one. 

Here are some lyrics from the song I just found.....

"I'm not feeling so well, maybe we could just sit for a spell. And make amends-it depends on my injury, I dont wanna be me."
"I'm not feeling so sure, it would help if you offered a cure. If I wait it's too late for the remedy, I don't wanna be me."
"You won't save me, cause I"m not the fortunate one. So don't blame me, if I decided to go hide or instead just run"

So I'm addicted to this song right now. It's called anonymous by bobby valentino and most of you probably haven't heard of it before but yes it is a great song.

So this spring break has taken a turn for the best. It started out pretty crappy with me having a full case of the flu but I've noticed I get a lot of well needed thinking done when I'm sick so I was very productive during this time. As the week progresses I've gotten to a very calm point now where I am in a happier state. I made amends with someone that was truly my other half because for 7 years she was my best friend ever so today I talked to her for the first time in months and we are ok again. I've seen so many of my old friends like Amber, David I even saw karys today at celebration I didnt see her at first but she stopped me and said hi it was a cool weird.

So I've come to this point in my relationship where I think we will truly make it for a while. I mean we've gotten passed the evil 2 months, the drinking issue, even the touching thing isn't a problem which everyone said was going to be so HA in your face. We're doing good though I mean we are on understanding terms, there is still tons of mystery which is another thing I need in a relationship because I dont want to know everything there is to know about someone all at once. I want to continue to learn things and believe me there is so much more to know. But so far as us as a whole we're doing good. Besides my random moodswings which are getting under control and my clinginess which I still need to work on. I dont have a pic of him in my wallet, we dont have a secret hand shake, he doesnt have his very own ringtone, and I dont cook him pancakes or vice versa so sorry gym class heroes but besides that we are great. I truly have come to love him with all my heart which is something hard since it has been broken so many times but I don't think he will hurt me so hey what is there left to lose?

Some parting lyrics for you all....

"For a moment I almost lost everything, for a moment I forgot about memories. But I wonder and realize how much you mean to me, for a moment I almost lost you and me."

"And I know this much is true, baby you have become my addiction. I'm so strung out on you, can barely move but I like it, and it's all because of you, yeah it's all because of you. And it's all because I can never get enough, you're the sweetest drug."

This is me,
not that fake smile perk bitch.
Just me,
if you dont like it too bad.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Today is that day my friend,
where time seperates mice from men.
Where all the patience I once had,
is finally over and I'm glad.

I'm done being your smile,
you're shoulder to cry on for a while.
I'm done being the perfect friend,
all that has come to an end.

Not for ever just for now,
I know you all must be thinking wow.
No you're not that's a lie,
you're probably wishing I'd just die.

And thats ok because I dont care,
you're feelings please dont share.
Stay in your perfect world where you are,
please keep it that way like you have so far.

Stay in your groups with your perfect jokes,
and your perfect laughs oh I wanna choke.
Dont come much closer I'm not feeling it,
and the sympathy for me please do quit.

I'll be back to that nice girl you all know,
but for right now she has to go.
It's ok because when it's all done,
you'll all finally see the sun.

But for now go away I dont want you around,
my feet finally have to tread on the ground.
And when I'm done and can fake it again,
that's when I'll try and call you all a friend.

February 26, yup that was the last time i updated this thing. I swear I have so much to do in life that I never have time to sit down and write about it. Maybe if I did I could end up like that movie Bridget Jones' Diary. That was a good movie with a very sweet ending. Somehow I dont see me ending up on the corner of a street in a robe and tank with undies of a leopard print chasing some guy in the snow. However, who am I to predict the future? Anyways back to the regular scheduled programmed. Yeah so my life in a nutshell.....I say that a lot btw if you haven't noticed I like to put my life in a nutshell....why a nutshell you may ask? Beats me. Maybe it's because if it's in a shell it doesnt look as messy or disorganized rather than if it was just laid out on a table. Maybe I'm just over-analyzing this small and insignifant detail. 

My life in a nutshell...well lets see. Homelife=horrible  school=horrible   friends=semi-horrible   relationship=not too bad   personal perception=horrible

Well according to that data doesn't seem like I'm doing too good now does it? In all life could be worse. I mean it could be like when I was younger and believe me it was much more horrible then because I had a lot less than I do now so I guess I'm at the positive end of the number line. Yay me. I've been doing some evaluating lately on my life. I do one good evaluation about every month or so according to the time I have left after my 28 days of hard labor. This month I noticed that I really dont trust well. That's my biggest issue. I don't trust the people around me, those that know me, man sometimes I dont trust myself and in some ways that is a good thing because if you dont trust then you cant get hurt however in some ways that is bad. If you are still reading this right now I applaud you for have the attention span to read all of this. Furthermore I congradulate you for putting up with my ramblings and short comings as a writer. I'm sure someone of a much more novelist nature could do better but I guess I will do. So yeah I think I might have to start doing something about this nature that I am in. Maybe stop being so hard on the people around me because I can almost promise you that after we graduate I probably wont see most of these people again so why not liev life in the moment? 

"She's got the cutest laugh I've ever heard, and we can be on the phone for three hours not saying one word. And I would stil cherish ever moment, and when I start to build my future she's the main component. Call it dumb, call it luck, call it love, or whatever you call it, but everywhere I go I keep her picture in my wallet."

"And ask me how I'm doing tonight..."

The answer....unsure. Like you don't know if you are mad, sad, depressed, happy, confused, or all of the above. I'm just existing right now. It's really weird like I feel like I should be floating/hovering above my computer or something. Who knows...maybe a few pain killers will give me sensations back. Or falling down the stairs which ever comes first. 

I annoy you I'm sorry I can't help it. It's that girly side of me that only comes out when I'm trying insecure and that right now my friend is me. It is beyond my control sometimes. But I will take this opportunity to state that I was right about you getting annoyed with me because of it. Yeah...life=shitty.

Why must the one close group of friends of mine have this problem now? I mean we all need each other more than ever right now because face it guys we are going through some shitty stuff right now and so we should be having more dancing in Ash's basement instead of chatroom hate crimes against humanity. Let's not let the pressures of life and our inner girls take away something that is truly keeping us together. Well besides me. I love you guys...."close my eyes, let the whole thing pass me by. There is no time, to waste."

"Do you wake up on your own and wonder where you are?"

"Hate me today, hate me tomorrow, hate me for all the things I didn't do for you."

"Coming down the world turned over and angels fall without you there. And I go on as your get colder or are you someone's prayer?"

So I'm reading these entries and my current group of friends talk about how they miss their days as a cult. You know what I miss....when they were in a cult I was safe and warm at James' house hanging out with his family and watching movies and drinking grape faygo. That's what I miss...that security. And I know for a fact that this entry will be misinterrupted into I miss him but that's not it. I miss that comfort, security and love I use to have. That feeling of nothing existing in the world except me and the person I was with. I really miss that feeling and I haven't had that in a while. I'm not saying I will never have it but I do miss just spending time alone with that someone, not saying one word and just laying there in his arms not worried about all the stress around me. I miss that. A lot.

"I like where you sleep, when you sleep next to me."

"In my mind, I'll always be his lady. In my mind, I'll always be his girl. Only time, will tell if I"m his lady. But in my mind, I'll always be his girl."

"You never lied to me not once, it's not your fault that I can't trust. It's in my past, it's in my past and I can't go back."

"Time to be your only, to almost be you way too young. Time to crash into the sun, time to be your 21. Time to think that love will last, time to drive my car too fast. Time to walk before I run, time to be your 21."

Yeah for all of you that know me know that is a really bad header. I don't know it like hit me last night. I don't know what this is or where it came from but it is not a good thing and only bad can result from this. I was bitter last night and it has developed into being not happy. I don't like not being happy. I love being happy but for some reason something is keeping me from being in that state. Maybe it has something to do with what time of the month it is. And no I'm not talking about the girly stuff. I'm talking about Valentine's Day. Yeah it is coming up pretty quickly. What does that mean....idk. I had so many plans for this one and then worst came to worst and so those were shattered. I mean I should be excited right...I think I should be. 

"I just have to hear those sweet words, singing like a melody."

"You're waiting for someone to put you together, waiting for someone to push you away."


Please say something nice and make me feel like I'm not just this most horrible person ever. Tell me I'm amazing, say you wanna be with me. God....help me.

FRIDAY

Seems like everyone knows someone who is having surgery lately. My sister just had her surgery and is in her recovery period now. There are some good and some bad times for her but I'm proud of her for handling it so well. TO be an 8 year old and have surgery and take it the way she is...well it's a good thing. She's doing much better than I did....I had my first surgery at the age of 7 and believe me I was anything but good about it. I was horrible and my recovery lasted extra time because I was so bad about it. But the doctor says that she'll be back up and running like normal in a couple of weeks. Today is a bad day. We were warned about the ups and downs but today is a down. She's not feelin well and doesn't look to well. THe best we can do is keep her stable and keep using her medication. It's been tough but all good things come with time.
